title: Forest Background Music
description: Add fantasy, atmosphere and an exploration vibe to your games with these 6 forest themes (divided in 23 tracks so you can create interactive music) that will take the music of your game to new heights at a low price.
longDescription:
Forest Background Music

Add fantasy, atmosphere and an exploration vibe to your games with these 6 forest themes (divided in 23 tracks so you can create interactive music) that will take the music of your game to new heights at a low price.


Youtube - Listen to a video preview of the tracks

Tracklist PDF


More about the pack:

- This pack can be complemented with: RPG/Fantasy Music Pack

- The songs on the pack are useful for exploration, village themes, sanctuarys, mystic places, cinematics, etc...

- This music tracks are perfect to set up a forest atmosphere.

- Made with mainly orchestral instruments but also with ethnic elements

- The pack contains stems so you can create interactive music.
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  •  The songs on the pack are useful for exploration, village themes, sanctuarys, mystic places, cinematics, etc...
  •  This music tracks are perfect to set up a forest atmosphere.
  •  Made with mainly orchestral instruments but also with ethnic elements
  • The pack contains stems so you can create interactive music.


Number of Audio Wavs: 23

Number of Audio Cues: 23

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 13 minutes and 26 seconds
